lacks motivation. full of own self importance.

Not as good as.
that one there, no, not this one.
category.

position.

never was.
never will be again.
the only way is down.
so now ambels around aimlessly.
casting around for that magic. me.

it is denied.

searches for own epitaph in graveyard.
